      Class implements a single SLNP connection.

      Creates a media search request to lookup media information for a single media by the signature.
      MediaSearchRequest(Connectable con, Credentials cred, java.lang.String signature, int maxHit)
      Creates a media search request to lookup media information for a media group specified by the signature.
      MediaSearchRequest(Connectable con, Credentials cred, java.lang.String signature, int maxHit, int hitStart)
      Creates a media search request to lookup media information for a media group specified by the signature.

      Creates a media search request to lookup media information for a query specified by searchStr.

      Receives the response from the SLNP server using the supplied connection.
      void Request.send(Connectable con)
      Sends the request to the SLNP server using the supplied connection.
